sentence: GOP candidates are already pummeling each other in monthslong advertising free-for-alls, fights intensified by unprecedented television spending.? THE COWBOY STATE Liz Cheney turns to Democrats to save her hide,? by Tara Palmeri, POLITICO: In 2007, in this blue bastion of one of the reddest states in the country, liberal activists wheeled a giant statue of Dick Cheney through town to protest his star role in the Iraq War before toppling it, Saddam Hussein style, for good measure.
